CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'If selected, it enables application traffic identification including support for L4-L7 application identification and statistics export.','7362 DF 16GW supports at the downlink side, 16x GPON ports using 8x dual GPON XFP optics: 1 dual XFP provides traffic to 2GPON ports. (max. 8 dual XFPs, one already included in the starter Kit). Two variants are supported depending on the temperature range requested at the uplink side, A maximum of 8x uplink interfaces is supported (one already included in the starter Kit). Any combination of 10GE and 1GE SFP+ can be selected. A wide list of different standard 1GE and 10GE SFPs with different reach are supported.')
CustomField.label: Guidance
